titleStmt.title: SII 7.1003: original edition by K.V. Subrahmanya Aiyer
No. 1003. (A.R. No. 373 of 1902). ON THE EAST WALL OF THE PARAKARA OF THE SAME TEMPLE, RIGHT OF ENTRANCE.

revisionDesc.change: Further conversion of digital encoding to DHARMA encoding scheme according to EGD (Encoding Guide for Diplomatic Editions)
Conversion of digital encoding to DHARMA encoding scheme according to EGD (Encoding Guide for Diplomatic Editions)

div.p:
svasti śrī . pūmevu vaḷar tiruppoṉmātu puṇara nāmevu kalaimakaḷ nalapperutu ci
ṟappa vicaiyamāmakaḷ velpuyat tiruppa Icaiyuñ celvamum Eṇṭicai viḷaṅka nirupar va
ntiṟaiñca niḻnilamaṭantaiyait tirumaṇam puṇarntu cirvaḷar tarumam Aṇimuṭi kavittena maṇi
muṭi cūṭi mallaiñālattu palluyirk kellām Ellaiyi limpam Iyalvini leyti ve
ṇkuṭai niḻaṟṟi ceṅko locci vāḻi pallūḻi Āḻi naṭappa cempoṉ virasiṁhāsaṉa
ttu puvaṉamuḻutuṭaiyāḷoṭum viṟṟiruntaruḷiya kopparakecaripanmarāṉa tribhuvanacakrava
ttikaḷ śrīkulottuṅkacoḻadevaṟkku yāṇṭu 5 Āvatu Irājarājavaḷanāṭṭut tirumuṉaippāṭi melū
rnāṭṭu tirunāvalūrāna Irājātittapurattu Uṭaiyār tiruttoṇṭiśvaramuṭaiya mahā
devar koyilil civabrāhmaṇarom Upaiyam Ivvūr viyāpāri peruvalamuṭaiyāṉ peṇ
ṇainetivāṇan tirucciṟṟampalamuṭaiyāṉ Ittevaṟku vaitta tirununtāviḷakku 1 Oṉṟu It
tirununtāviḷakku 1 Oṉṟukkum Ivaṉ Eṅkaḷvacattu viṭṭa pacu 3 10 2 Ippacu muppattiraṇṭuṅ
kaikkoṇṭu cantrādittavarai Upaiyamāka nāṅkaḷe Ittiruṉuntāviḷakku Oṉṟum peruvalamuṭaiyā
ṉ peṇṇainetivāṇan tirucciṟṟampalamuṭaiyāṉukkāka Erikkakkaṭavomāka sammatittom Ikko
yilil civabrāhmaṇarom Ittiruṉuntāviḷakku Oṉṟum Eriyakkaṭavutāka Ivaṉ Iṭṭa tarāk kut
tiviḷakku naārāyam Uḷpaṭa Iṭai ṉūṟṟeḻupatiṉ palam Itu panmāheśvara rakṣai . meṟpaṭiyāṉa .
Digital edition of SII 7.1003 by converted to DHARMA conventions by Dorotea Operato.
